lg.l: savṛ || nuḍigaḷoḍaṁbaḍal bagedavol bagedavolbageyaṁ migalīyyadoṁde nā

ḻnuḍiyabeḍaṁge kaṁnaḍa
ḍada mātinoḷ ā vikaṭākṣaraṁgaḷoḷ
toḍarade sakkadaṁgaḷa padaṁ pavaṇāgire mēlpuvettu dāṁ
prakaṭaṁ māḍire peḷda citrakṛtiyaṁ vyāvarnnisuttuṁ kavi

trailer.ab: idu paramaśrīnṛpatuṁgadevānumatam appa kavirājamārggadoḷ doṣānuvarnanirnayaṁ prathama paricchedaṁ ||

aṁtu prathamaparicchedagake kaṁda vr̥tta gitike dhrutaviḷaṁba sahitā 150 kaṁ maṁgaḷa mahā śrī śrī śrī śrī śrī śrī śrī śrī śrī śrī yyā
gagigodu yeraḍaneya paricchedadalli hadhimūraneya graṁtha || yeṁṭanevāliya aparārdhadalli prathamāgi haṁneraḍu graṁtha baradu āde ||

note.p: This verse is missing in manuscript A (see the scribe’s comments at the end of the first pariccheda).
